nodes.text: Shifting Sand was a Jedi meditation technique. Jedi Initiates were taught the meditation as a way to focus on levitating small particles using the Force. At some point, Initiates Dooku and Sifo-Dyas attended a class on levitation taught by Jedi Grand Master Yoda, where the Shifting Sand meditation was introduced. Dooku was considered the top of his class.

In 87 BBY, Dooku and Sifo-Dyas broke into the Bogan Collection, a secret vault within the Jedi Archives containing dark side artifacts. At Sifo-Dyas's behest, Dooku used the Shifting Sand technique to slide sand between the door to the vault and the wall, breaking the door's lock and thus allowing the pair entry into the room. In 42 BBY, during an invasion of the planet Serenno by Abyssin mercenaries, Dooku and Sifo-Dyas used the Shifting Sand technique to break into an occupied comm tower on the outskirts of Serenno's capital city, Carannia.
The Shifting Sand meditation appeared in Dooku: Jedi Lost, a 2019 audio drama written by Cavan Scott.
